Market Overview: What's next post-COVID?


As we use machine learning to predict and produce results from 2019, I am 100% sure no one predicted an entire pandemic to come on the scene. The pandemic triggered a number of channels, including for example, labor markets, global supply chains, consumption behaviors, all of which can affect global economy. So how have we adapted to such cause? Technology! Technology stocks, specifically software names, soared in 2020, delivering 42% returns, according to Fidelity. The accelerated shift towards work-from-anywhere, driven by COVID, resulted in breathtaking returns for investors who placed massive bets in areas such as e-commerce and the companies that enabled remote work and learn-from-home. (Resource: https://www.marketbeat.com/stocks/NASDAQ/MCEP/)
But with the Nasdaq Composite Index (COMP) closing 2020 in record territory, finding value and knowing where to place your cash could be a difficult decision. However! 2020 winners have continued to flourish. The reason being that these top-performers will continue to flow more and more into our everyday lives, affirming our reliance on their products and service. So who are these lucky winners you ask? The 5 2020 Nasdaq Tech Winners to own in 2021 are Zoom (Up 420% in 2020; 12-Month Target: $500) , Peloton (Up 351% in 2020; 12-Month Target: $200) , CrowdStrike (Up 322% in 2020; 12-Month Target: $275), DocuSign (Up 200% in 2020; 12-Month Target: $300) and Roku (Up 148% in 2020; 12-Month Target: $400).
